resources.string: YOU CAN CHOOSE THE TABLE WHERE SCANNED ITEM WILL SAVED.
HERE YOU CAN ADD DATA BEFORE SAVE BARCODE IN THE TABLE. YOU CAN ADD YOUR OWN FIELDS IN TABLE EDITOR.
YOU CAN ATTACH IMAGE FROM GALLERY OR MAKE A PHOTO. AND ATTACH IT TO THE BARCODE
WHEN YOU FINISH EDIT BARCODE INFORMATION JUST CLICK SUBMIT
WHEN BARCODE BEEN SAVED. YOU CAN LOOK AT IT IN THE HISTORY SECTION
YOU WILL FIND RESULT IN HISTORY
Please allow the READ EXTERNAL STORAGE permission for selecting images from gallery.
(you can add several images or photos)
